effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage. Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.

short_effect.sun_moon: Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A nutrient-draining attack. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A nutrient-draining attack. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A nutrient-draining attack. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.
